121976.en:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>Hey, Chickibo, I really need you to
help me find my mom.<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121976.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>「ねえ……ホントに頼むよ　チキ坊。
　母さんを探すために　チカラを貸してほしい。<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121977.en: <start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>Please! Because this is the way it is!<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121977.ja: <start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>「お願い！　この通りだから！<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121979.en:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>Huh. That's right. You're that kind of
guy.<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121979.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>「はあぁぁ……。そうだよね……。
　お前って　そういうやつだよね……。<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121980.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Thorn, Chickibo seems to be in a bad
mood.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121980.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「ソーン。チキ坊は……
　ご機嫌ナナメみたいですね。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121981.en:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>No, my mom is in trouble. I can't talk
like that. I'll try again!<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121981.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>「いや……母さんが　大変なんだ。
　そんなこと　言ってられないよ。
　もう一度　やってみる……！<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121982.en:
Only the fierce rooster knows which way the wind is blowing. O true white weathercock! From windward to leeward,
make a bond.
121982.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>「……善き風向きは　猛き雄鶏だけが知る。
　おお　真白き風見鶏よ。
　風上から風下へ　縁を結べ……。<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121983.en:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>Let the Dead Tree bloom! Let's feed
the chickens!<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121983.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>「枯れ木に　花を　咲かせましょう！
　ニワトリには　エサを　あげましょう～～っ！<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121984.ja: <start_lip_sync n03749 _normal m00001>「コココッ……！？　コケ～～～ッ！！<stop_lip_animation n03749 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121985.en: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Is that the direction to the north?<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121985.ja: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「あれは……北の方角でしょうか？<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121986.en:
Ummm. If you go that far, you will cross the Dwachakka Continent and the Lendersia Continent, and maybe even
the Eltona Continent.
121986.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>「う　うん。あそこまで行くと　そうとう北……
　ドワチャッカ大陸や　レンダーシア大陸も越えて
　もしかすると　エルトナ大陸だったりして……。<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121987.en:
However, the scope of your search is too broad, and it's not much of an asset, is it? I'm sorry I can't be of
any help at all.
121987.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>「とはいえ　探す範囲が広すぎるし
　アテにならないよね。ごめんよ……
　全然　役に立てなくて……はあっ……。<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121989.en: <start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>Oh, maybe Ezell was divining too?<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121989.ja: <start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>「あ……もしかして　エゼルも占ってたの？<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121990.en:
<start_lip_sync n03748 _normal m00001>Of course. I can't say such a pathetic
thing because it's Mom's big deal, no
matter how much it won't win.<stop_lip_animation n03748 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121990.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03748 _normal m00001>「もちろんよ。いくら　当たらないからって
　母さんの　一大事なんだし
　そんな情けないこと　言ってられないもん。<stop_lip_animation n03748 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121991.en:
<start_lip_sync n03748 _normal m00001>But not at all! No matter how much I
read, it's the same. All I can see is
a vague image.<stop_lip_animation n03748 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121991.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03748 _normal m00001>「でも……全然ダメ！　いくら占っても同じよ。
　ぼんやりしたイメージしか　見えてこないの。<stop_lip_animation n03748 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121992.en:
<start_lip_sync n03748 _normal m00001>It's a very gloomy, desolate place,
and a big, black, eerie shadow looms
right in front of you.<stop_lip_animation n03748 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121992.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03748 _normal m00001>「すご～く陰気で　荒れ果てた場所……
　黒くて　大きくて　不気味な影が
　すぐ間近に　立ちはだかっている……。<stop_lip_animation n03748 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121993.en:
By gloomy and creepy, do you mean like demon miasma? But beyond that, I don't know. I'm sorry, Yoon-ho. I'm not much
help.
121993.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03748 _normal m00001>「陰気で不気味っていうと……魔瘴とか？
　でも　それ以上のことは　わからないわ。
　ごめんね　ユノ。あたし　役に立てなくて……。<stop_lip_animation n03748 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121994.en:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>No, no, no, if you put it that way,
I'm much more useless than you.<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121994.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03747 _normal m00001>「いやいや　それを言うなら　僕の方が
　ずっと　役立たずだから……。<stop_lip_animation n03747 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121995.en:
<start_lip_sync n03748 _normal m00001>No. I'm much more useless than you.
I'm much, much more useless than you.<stop_lip_animation n03748 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121995.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03748 _normal m00001>「ううん。あたしの方が
　ずっとずっと　役立たずだもん……。<stop_lip_animation n03748 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121996.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>No, it is not. No, that's not true! If
we put our fortunes together, we might
be able to find your mother.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121996.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「……いいえ。そんなことありません！
　ふたりの占いを合わせれば　母さんを
　見つけることが　できるかもしれませんよ。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121998.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>It's in a gloomy, desolate area north
of here, near a black, large, eerie
shadow. Any idea where that might be?<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121998.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「ここから北の　陰気で荒れ果てた地にある
　黒くて　大きくて　不気味な影の近く……。
　どこかに　心当たりはありませんか？<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

121999.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>I'm sure that if we use their readings
as clues, we can locate my mother.
Let's split up and look for her.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
121999.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「ふたりの占いを　手がかりにすれば　きっと
　母さんの居場所を　突き止められるはずです。
　手分けして　探してみましょう。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122000.en:
Something is bothering me. I have a feeling that something is going to happen to my mother. Let's hurry
before it's too late!
122000.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「……何か　胸騒ぎがするのです。
　よくないことが　母さんに起きている気がして。
　手遅れにならないうちに　急ぎましょう！<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122001.en: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>Oh, my God! I knew it was here.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122001.ja: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>さん！　やっぱり　ここでしたか。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122002.en:
This is where Thorn and Ezell's fortune-telling led them. I also thought the big black shadow was the
Dark Tree, so I came here.
122002.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「ソーンとエゼルの占いから　導き出された場所。
　私も　大きな黒い影は　暗黒大樹だと思い
　ここへ　来てみたのですが……。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122004.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>They're really good kids to figure
this place out. Mother, your nose is
so high!<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122004.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「ここを突き止めるなんて　本当に優秀な子たち。
　母さん　鼻が高いわ♪　ふふっ！<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122005.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Mother. What are you doing?What on
earth do you intend to start? Tell me
everything!<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122005.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「母さん。あなたは　何をしているんですか？ 
　いったい　何を　始めるつもりなんですか？
　教えてください……すべてを！<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122006.en:
Oops. You can tell by looking at it, can't you? I'm trying to re-boryuition everyone's heart with the power of
pure pearl.
122006.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「あら。見ればわかるでしょう？
　ピュアパールのチカラで　みんなのハートを
　レボリューションしようとしてるのよ<heart><stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122007.en:
The powerful spiritual energy pure pearl produced by the human mind, and the fortune teller's secret Arcana
serapia to harvest it.
122007.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「人の心が生み出す　強力な精神エネルギー
　ピュアパール。そして　それを採取するための
　占い師の秘術　アルカナ・セラピア……。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122008.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>Only a talented fortune teller can use
this technique. I appreciate it, yuno.<cs_pchero>....... Thank you so much for your
hard work in recovering the pure
PEARL...<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122008.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「この術を使えるのは　才能ある占い師だけ。
　感謝してるわよ　ユノ　<cs_pchero>。
　ピュアパールの回収　本当にご苦労様でした♪<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122009.en:
As long as I have this giant pure pearl made from the pure pearls you have collected, I can control people's
hearts and minds as I wish.
122009.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「あなたたちの集めた　ピュアパールから作った
　この　巨大ピュアパールさえあれば
　人の心を　思うままに　支配できるの。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122010.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Was it to perfect this that you taught
us Arcana Serapia?<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122010.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「私たちに　アルカナ・セラピアを教えたのは
　これを　完成させるためだったんですか……？<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122011.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>Is this really such a shock to you?
You know how many distressed people
I've read up on?<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122011.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「そんなに　ショックを受けるようなことかしら？
　……アタシが　今まで　どれだけの悩める人々を
　占ってきたのか　知っているでしょう？<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122012.en:
No matter how much I divine each day, no matter how many of each person's problems I solve, the world will never
rid itself of suffering.
122012.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「毎日　どんなに占っても　ひとりひとりの悩みを
　どれだけ解決してあげても　世界中から
　苦悩が消えることはない……。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

142651.en: <start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>This is not going to end well!<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
142651.ja: <start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「これじゃ　ラチがあかないのよ……！<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122013.en:
How do I make people's worries and pains disappear from their minds? How can I save people in the truest sense
of the word? I've been thinking about it, and I've finally realized.
122013.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「人の心から　悩み苦しみを　消し去るには？
　真の意味で　人々を救うには　どうしたらいい？
　……考えに考えて　ついに悟ったわ。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122014.en:
The mind that is afflicted must be extinguished! I'm going to control and unify people's hearts. Mix them all
up, melt them together, and make them one.
122014.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「悩める心　そのものを　消し去ればいい！
　人の心を支配して　統一する……。
　全部まぜて　溶け合って　ひとつにしちゃうの。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122015.en:
It's the easiest and happiest way to rid the world of all the people who bother you, isn't it? What do you
think? This genius theory
122015.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「世の中から　悩める人々を　一掃しちゃう
　もっともイージーで　ハッピーな方法でしょう？
　どう？　この天才的理論♪<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122016.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Indeed, Mom always said. The ultimate
goal of a fortune teller is to rid the
world of all those who are afflicted.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122016.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「……確かに　母さんは　いつも言っていました。
　占い師の　究極の目的とは　悩める人々を
　この世から　一切なくすことだと。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122017.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>I respect your aspirations. Your dream
is my dream. Always have been and
always will be.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122017.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「あなたの志を尊敬しています。
　あなたの夢は　私の夢です……。
　今までも　そして　これからも。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122018.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>But! This is not the way to trample on
people's hearts! I beg you, please
wake up!<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122018.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「でも……！　人の心を　踏みにじるような
　こんなやり方は　間違っています！
　お願いですから　目を覚ましてくださいっ！<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122019.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>I'm perfectly sane, you know. And you
don't have to worry about whether I'm
wrong or not anymore.<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122019.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「あらやだ……アタシは　いたって正気よ？
　それに　間違ってるとか　間違ってないとか
　そんなことは　もう　気にしなくていいの。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122020.en:
In the future, human will will no longer exist. We will be free from worry and pain, and the Dark Mind will
disappear without a trace.
122020.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「この先の未来に　もはや　人の意思というものは
　存在しなくなるの。悩み苦しみから解放され
　心の闇なんて　跡形もなく消え去るのよ。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122021.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>used after the name of someone who is
an older sister figure<cs_pchero>It's a wonderful thing to be free of
worries. Isn't it wonderful to be free
of worries... don't you think so?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122021.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「ねえ　<cs_pchero>……。
　悩みがなくなるって　ステキなことよね♪
　あなたも　そう思わない？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122022.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>I knew it! I knew you would understand
me.<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122022.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「やっぱり　そうよね！　あなたなら
　わかってくれるって　信じてたわ～♪<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122023.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>Oh, that's too bad. But okay. I'm sure
you'll be all for it in no time.<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122023.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「あら　残念……。でも　いいわ。
　あなたも　すぐに　大賛成してくれるはずよ♪<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122024.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>Let's build our ideal world, shall we?
First things first.<cs_pchero>I'm going to save you! I'll save you
by taking control of everything deep
inside of you!<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122024.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「さあ　理想の世界を築きましょ……？
　まずは　<cs_pchero>！　あなたの心の奥底まで
　そのすべてを支配して……救ってあげるわっ！<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122025.en: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>I'm not sure what you mean!<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122027.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>Why? Certainly.<cs_pchero>Why can't you control it when it's
connected to your mind?<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122027.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「なぜなの……？
　確かに　<cs_pchero>の心に　接続しているのに
　なぜ　支配できないの！？<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122028.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>I was controlled by a single pure
pearl.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122028.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「私なんて　たった　ひと粒のピュアパールで
　心を　支配されてしまったのに……。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122029.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>Why don't you accept it? Is there no
hesitation in you? Think about it!<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122029.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「どうして受け入れないの！
　あなたの中に　迷いはないというの？
　思いだしてごらんなさい……！<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122030.en:
We are afraid of getting hurt, we lose our courage, we are tired of chasing dreams, we lose hope, we envy others,
and we lose sight of what is important to us!
122030.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「キズつくのを怖れ　勇気を見失い……
　夢を追うことに疲れ　希望を見失い……
　他者をねたんで　大切な想いを見失う……！<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122031.en:
We are weak creatures. Always worrying and fretting in the depths of darkness. You want to be relieved,
don't you? Don't you want to be saved?
122031.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「人は　弱い生き物なのよ。
　常に思い悩み　闇の淵で　あえぎ続ける……。
　ラクになりたいでしょ。救われたいでしょ！？<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122032.en: <start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>And why. Why you. Ugh ugh ugh ugh!<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122032.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「なのに　なぜ……。なぜ　あなたは……。
　ぐっ……ううっ　ううううっ……！<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122033.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>This way of suffering. It is very
similar to those of you who have had
your readings at Arcana Therapia!<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122033.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「この　苦しみ方……。
　今までに　アルカナ・セラピアで占ってきた
　みなさんと　よく　似ています……！<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122034.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Perhaps, Mother. Is there a lost soul
in your mind? Is there a hidden true
fruit in the Dark Mind?<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122034.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「……もしかして　母さん。
　あなたの心の中には　迷いが……？
　隠された真実が　心の闇にあるのでは……。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122035.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>You are now connected to your mother's
heart through the pure pearl.
Conversely, you can enter her heart.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122035.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「今の　あなたは　ピュアパールを通して
　母さんの心と　つながっている状態です。
　逆に　母さんの心の中にも　入れるでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122036.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Please, please, as a fortune teller,
save my mother!<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122036.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「どうか　お願いです。占い師として……
　母さんを　救ってあげてください！<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122037.en:
Giggidy, how dare you allow your heart to be invaded. Margaret. How could you be so stupid at this point in your
life?
122037.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>「ギギギッ……おのれの心に　侵入を許すとは。
　マルグリットめ。この期におよんで
　どこまでも　おろかな女よ。<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122038.en:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>I am another will born from her Dark
Mind.<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122038.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>「我は　この女の心の闇から　生まれた
　もうひとつの　意思……。<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122039.en:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>I was going to take the place of this
lost woman and do as I pleased,
control every mind.<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122039.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>「迷いのある　この女に成り代わり
　我が意のままに事を進め　すべての心を
　支配してやるつもりだったが……<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122040.en:
Very well. First, I will entangle your heart and sink it to the depths of darkness!
Gigigigigiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii!
122040.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>「よかろう。まずは　貴様の心を絡め取り
　深い闇の底へと　沈めてやろう！
　ギギギギィィィィッ！！<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122041.ja: <start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「ぐっ……ううう……っ！<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122042.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Now you can enter your mother's heart
through PURE PEARL. Please, one more
time!<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122042.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「今なら　ピュアパールを通して
　母さんの心の中にも　入れるはず。
　お願いします　もう一度……！<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122043.ja: <start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>「ギョォオオオォォォォォ……！<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122044.en:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>My defeat? You must be a soft
existence, trapped in the Dark Mind,
forever struggling.<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122044.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>「わ…我が　負けるだと……？
　貴様らは　心の闇に囚われ　永遠に
　もがき続ける　軟弱な存在のはず……。<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122045.en:
In fact, she was weak! In order to escape her worries and suffering, she gradually gave herself over to the
Dark Mind.
122045.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>「事実　この女は　弱かった！
　悩み苦しみから逃れるため　次第に
　心の闇に　身をゆだねていったのだ……。<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122046.en:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>And yet, why? Why have you not fallen
into darkness? What is going on in
your heart!<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122046.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>「なのに　なぜだ！　なぜ貴様は闇に堕ちぬ！
　いったい　貴様の心は　どうなっているのだ！？<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122047.en:
GigiGigi, what a surprise. By continuing to be close to people's hearts and facing their troubles, will
we grow into such unshakable souls?
122047.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>「ギギ……ギ……なんと……。
　人の心に寄り添い続け　悩みと向き合うことで
　かくも揺るぎなき魂へと　成長するのか……？<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122048.en:
The human heart gives birth to darkness. But is it also the human heart that bears the unyielding will?
Farewell, O strong fortune teller.
122048.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50122 _normal m00001>「人の心は闇を生む。だが……
　不屈の意志を宿すのも　また　人の心か……。
　さらばだ　強き占い師……よ……。<stop_lip_animation m50122 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122049.en: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Mom. Why are you doing this?<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122049.ja: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「母さん……。どうして　こんなことを……？<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122050.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>I had a daughter once, born with an
upset stomach. I lost her to illness
at an early age.<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122050.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「……かつて　お腹を痛めて　産んだ娘がいたの。
　幼くして　病気で亡くしたわ……。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122051.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>I knew by fortune-telling that she was
going to die. But I could not save her
from her fate.<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122051.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「アタシは　あの子が死ぬという未来を
　占いで知っていた。でも……死の運命からは
　とうとう　救ってあげることが　できなかった。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122052.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>A fortune teller is helpless. I can't
even save the life of my own child.<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122052.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「……占い師なんて　無力だわ。
　我が子の命　ひとつ　助けられないのに。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122053.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>But you know, on her deathbed, she
said. She said that fortune teller is
a wonderful vocation.<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122053.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「でもね……死の間際　あの子は言ったの。
　占い師は　すばらしい職業よ……って。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122054.en:
I wanted to become a fortune teller like my mother and eliminate the troubles and sufferings that everyone
in the world has.
122054.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「母さんみたいな　占い師になって
　世界中のみんなが抱える　悩みや苦しみを
　なくしてあげたかったって……。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122055.en:
From then on, I lived my life only to fulfill the dream that she couldn't fulfill. Day after day, I faced the
counselor's Dark Mind.
122055.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「それからのアタシは　あの子が果たせなかった
　夢をかなえるためだけに　生きたわ。
　毎日毎日　相談者の心の闇と　向き合った。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122056.en:
But only the feeling of emptiness grew. No matter how much you read, no matter how much you solve your
problems, people continue to suffer with new problems.
122056.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「でも……むなしさだけが　つのっていった。
　どんなに占っても　悩みを解決しても　人は
　新たな悩みを抱えて　苦しみ続ける……。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122057.en:
I blamed myself for being so helpless. And I was exhausted. Dangerous and distorted thoughts took over my
thoughts, and eventually a monster was born in my heart.
122057.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「無力な自分を　責めた。そして　疲れ果てた。
　危険で　ゆがんだ思考に　思いを支配され
　やがて……心に　魔物が生まれたの。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122058.en: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>It's a shame.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122058.ja: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「…………くやしい。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122059.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>YUNO. I used you for my own purposes.
I'm sorry. It's really unforgivable.<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122059.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「ユノ……。アタシは　自分の目的のために
　あなたを利用してしまった。ごめんなさい……。
　本当に　許されることではないわね……。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122060.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>No, Mother. I'm sorry I couldn't see
that you were alone with your
problems.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122060.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「違います　母さん……。
　母さんが　たったひとりで　悩んでいたことに
　気づけなかったのが　くやしいのです……。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122061.en:
As a fortune teller, I have faced the Dark Mind of various clients. Each of them was living their lives in their
own way while being troubled.
122061.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「私も　占い師として　さまざまな相談者の
　心の闇と向き合ってきました。それぞれが
　悩みながらも　自分らしく　生きていました。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122062.en:
It is beautiful and precious to see people trying to overcome their problems. I believe that it is
precisely because people are truly troubled that they become the people they are.
122062.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「人が　悩みを乗り越えようとする姿は　美しく
　尊いものです。本気で悩むからこそ　人は
　人らしくあるのだと……私は　そう思います。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122063.en:
That is why we, fortune tellers, are needed. Fortune teller is a vocation that faces people's problems and
continues to be close to their hearts.
122063.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「だからこそ　私たち　占い師が必要なんです。
　占い師は　人々の悩みと向き合い　その心に
　寄り添い続けていく　職業なのです。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

142652.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Because I believe that it is still the
human heart that rescues people from
darkness.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
142652.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「人の心を　闇から救いだすのは
　やっぱり……人の心だと思うから。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122064.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>And yet, I thought I was the only one
who was okay.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122064.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「それなのに　私は……
　母さんだけは　平気だと思い込んで……。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

143237.en: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>No one should be alone!<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
143237.ja: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「誰だって　ひとりで平気なはずがないのに……！<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122066.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>That's why... That's why, Mom. From
now on, I want you to talk to us about
your problems and sufferings.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122066.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「だから　だから……母さんっ……。
　これからは　あなたの悩みも　苦しみも
　私たちに　相談してほしいんです……。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122067.en: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Don't try to do it alone anymore!<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122067.ja: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「もう……ひとりで　がんばらないで……！<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122068.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>You are such a child. Before I knew
it, you've become a much better
fortune teller than I am.<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122068.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「あなたって子は……。
　いつの間にか　アタシなんかより
　ずっと立派な　占い師になっていたのね。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122069.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>I am truly grateful. Your straight
forward spirit saved me from the
depths of darkness.<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122069.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>……本当に　感謝しているわ。
　まっすぐ前を向く　あなたの魂が
　アタシを　深い闇の底から　救ってくれたの。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122070.en:
I want to have a strong heart like yours. So I'm going on a journey to go back to the beginning and face each
one of your problems.
122070.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「あなたのような　強い心を持ちたい……。
　だから　初心に戻って　ひとりひとりの
　悩みと向き合うための　旅に出るわ。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122071.en: <start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Wait a minute! Well then, Mother.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122071.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「待ってください！
　それじゃ　母さんは……。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122072.en:
To become a fortune teller unashamed of her ideals. And to become a Kunai human who is shy even when standing in
front of you.
122072.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「あの子の理想に恥じない　占い師になるために。
　そして……あなたたちの前に立っても
　はずかしくない　人間になるためにもね。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122073.en:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>But if I'm feeling crushed, would it
be okay if I went home to you all and
took a break?<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122073.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「でも……もしも　くじけそうになったら
　みんなのところへ　帰って
　ひと休みしても　いいかしら……？<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122074.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>Of course, Mother. We'll all be
waiting for you forever!<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122074.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「……もちろんです　母さん。
　いつまでも　みんなで　待っています！<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122075.ja: <start_lip_sync n03750 _normal m00001>「ユノ……ありがとう……。<stop_lip_animation n03750 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122076.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>Thank you so much for saving my mom.
Thank you so much for saving my mom.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122076.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>さん……。
　母さんを　助けてくださって
　本当に　ありがとうございました。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>

122077.en:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>I have one more favor to ask. It is
very important that you come back to
Divine House as soon as possible.<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
122077.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03746 _normal m00001>「……もうひとつだけ　お願いがあるのです。
　とても大事なお話なので　できるだけ早く
　占いの館まで　戻ってきてくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n03746 CLOSE_MOUTH>
